data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Al Minufiyah.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Minufiyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Al Minufiyah, Egypt to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Al Minufiyah, Egypt that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Al Minufiyah, Egypt. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Yemeni people might believe through him.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Al Minufiyah to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Al Minufiyah, Egypt to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Minufiyah, Egypt has a population of 3,228,900.

We estimate Al Minufiyah has 143,622 people who might know Jesus, 280,322 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,804,955 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Al Minufiyah, Egypt to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
